subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang improved his record to 16-5 in the first game of Wednesday's day-night doubleheader but Scott Proctor was unable to close game two with Mariano Rivera unavailable.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang improved his record to 16-5 in the first game of Wednesday's day-night doubleheader but Scott Proctor was unable to close game two with Mariano Rivera unavailable.
